org.spongycastle.crypto.signers

Class NTRUSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongycastle.crypto.signers.NTRUSigner

  • public class NTRUSigner
extends java.lang.Object
    Signs, verifies data and generates key pairs.
